mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD VALUES ( SEQ_FREEBOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{cateNo}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N', SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT FB.*, FLH.*, (COALESCE(FLH.LIKES, 0) - COALESCE(FLH.HATES, 0)) AS LH_COUNT, M.*, FBC.* FROM FREE_BOARD FB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BOARD_NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKES, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HATES FROM FREE_BOARD_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY BOARD_NO) FLH ON FB.NO = FLH.BOARD_NO JOIN (SELECT NO, ID, NICK WRITER_NICK, IMG_PATH WRITER_IMG FROM MEMBER) M ON FB.WRITER = M.NO JOIN (SELECT NO, NAME CATE FROM FREE_BOARD_CATEGORY) FBC ON FBC.NO = FB.CATE_NO WHERE WRITER = #{userNo} ORDER BY FB.NO DESC

SELECT FB.*, FLH.*, (COALESCE(FLH.LIKES, 0) - COALESCE(FLH.HATES, 0)) AS LH_COUNT, M.*, FBC.* FROM FREE_BOARD FB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BOARD_NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKES, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HATES FROM FREE_BOARD_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY BOARD_NO) FLH ON FB.NO = FLH.BOARD_NO JOIN (SELECT NO, ID, NICK WRITER_NICK, IMG_PATH WRITER_IMG FROM MEMBER) M ON FB.WRITER = M.NO JOIN (SELECT NO, NAME CATE FROM FREE_BOARD_CATEGORY) FBC ON FBC.NO = FB.CATE_NO WHERE FB.NO = #{bno} ORDER BY FB.NO

SELECT fbc.*, NVL(lh.L_COUNT,0) AS LIKES, NVL(lh.H_COUNT,0) AS HATES, m.NICK as WRITER_NICK, m.IMG_PATH as WRITER_IMG FROM FREE_BOARD_CMT fbc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CMT_NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS L_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS H_COUNT FROM FREE_BOARD_CMT_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY CMT_NO ) lh ON fbc.NO = lh.CMT_NO JOIN MEMBER m ON fbc.WRITER = m.NO WHERE fbc.BOARD_NO = #{bno} ORDER BY fbc."GROUP" ASC, fbc.MODIFY_DATE ASC
SELECT * FROM FREE_BOARD_CATEGORY ORDER BY NO ASC

SELECT lh.M_NO, s.M_NO, COALESCE(lh.BOARD_NO, s.BOARD_NO) as BOARD_NO, COALESCE(lh.STATUS, 'null') as STATUS, CASE WHEN s.BOARD_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END as SCRAP FROM FREE_BOARD_LIKE_HATE lh FULL OUTER JOIN FREE_BOARD_SCRAP s ON lh.BOARD_NO = s.BOARD_NO WHERE lh.M_NO = #{userNo} OR s.M_NO = #{userNo} AND s.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} OR lh.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FREE_BOARD_SCRAP WHERE M_NO = #{userNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FREE_BOARD_SCRAP WHERE M_NO = #{userNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT * FROM FREE_BOARD FB LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BOARD_NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKES, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HATES FROM FREE_BOARD_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY BOARD_NO) FLH ON FB.NO = FLH.BOARD_NO JOIN (SELECT NO, ID, NICK WRITER_NICK, IMG_PATH WRITER_IMG FROM MEMBER) M ON FB.WRITER = M.NO JOIN (SELECT NO, NAME CATE FROM FREE_BOARD_CATEGORY) FBC ON FBC.NO = FB.CATE_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT BOARD_NO SCRAP FROM FREE_BOARD_SCRAP WHERE M_NO = #{userNo}) FBS ON FB.NO = FBS.SCRAP WHERE FBS.SCRAP IS NOT NULL ORDER BY FB.NO DESC
